remarks: The general logarithm function is strictly monotone/increasing.  Property 2 of [Cohen4] p. 377.  See ~ logltb .  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Oct-2014.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Sep-2017.)
statement: logblt $p |- ( ( B e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ X e. RR+ /\ Y e. RR+ ) -> ( X < Y <-> ( B logb X ) < ( B logb Y ) ) ) $.
